attributes.action: transfer the legal jurisdiction of Cornwall from England, to the control and protection of the Welsh Assembly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cornwall is One of Seven Celtic Nations:
Ireland, Scotland, Isle of Man, Wales, Brittany, Cornwall and Galicia.

Cornwall (Kernow) has a distinct history, language and identity. 

The ancient country of Kernow is often referred to as "West Wales" before its conquest by the Anglo-Saxons.

Modern day Cornwall suffers both economically and politically by its connection to the non-Celtic nation of England.

We petition the Prime Minister to transfer the legal jurisdiction of Cornwall from England, to the control and protection of the Welsh Assembly.
